DryRun.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request, and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation. Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

Filters.description:
One or more filters. The possible values are:

  • default-association-route-table - Indicates whether this is the default association route table for the transit gateway (true | false).

  • default-propagation-route-table - Indicates whether this is the default propagation route table for the transit gateway (true | false).

  • state - The state of the attachment (available | deleted | deleting | failed | modifying | pendingAcceptance | pending | rollingBack | rejected | rejecting).

  • transit-gateway-id - The ID of the transit gateway.

  • transit-gateway-route-table-id - The ID of the transit gateway route table.

items.description:
A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. The filters supported by a describe operation are documented with the describe operation. For example:

  • DescribeAvailabilityZones

  • DescribeImages

  • DescribeInstances

  • DescribeKeyPairs

  • DescribeSecurityGroups

  • DescribeSnapshots

  • DescribeSubnets

  • DescribeTags

  • DescribeVolumes

  • DescribeVpcs

Name.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

Values.description: One or more filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive.

MaxResults.description: The maximum number of results to return with a single call. To retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned nextToken value.

NextToken.description: The token for the next page of results.

TransitGatewayRouteTableIds.description: The IDs of the transit gateway route tables.
